children.value: Install React Table as a dependency using

# NPM
$ npm install react-table

# Yarn
$ yarn add react-table

import {
  useTable,
  useGroupBy,
  useFilters,
  useSortBy,
  useExpanded,
  usePagination,
  ...
} from 'react-table'
Once you've installed React Table, continue to
to read more about how to utilize its API
